mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_bt_business_log ( `channel_id`, `cat_id`, `cart_id`, `group_id`, `group_name`, `product_id`, `product_name`, `promotion_id`, `promotion_name`, `model`, `code`, `sku`, `error_type_id`, `error_code`, `error_msg`, `status`, `created`, `creater`, `modified`, `modifier` ) VALUES( #{channelId}, #{catId}, #{cartId}, #{groupId}, #{groupName}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{promotionId}, #{promotionName}, #{model}, #{code}, #{sku}, #{errorTypeId}, #{errorCode}, #{errorMsg}, #{status}, now(), #{creater}, now(), #{creater} )
